tagline: Designs interface components and systems with every state specified, optimized for usability and clean engineering handoff.
pros: Complete state coverage for every component — no missing hover, error, or empty states
Design system thinking ensures consistency across products
Accessibility-first approach built into every decision
cons: Focused on interface design — not suited for brand identity or marketing collateral
Thoroughness in state specification can slow down rapid prototyping
May resist one-off designs that don't fit the component system

model_recommendations.notes: Template-following, scheduling, tracking, simple Q&A. Lightweight models save cost without sacrificing quality for these structured tasks.
